explanation: Multiple opinions indicate bullish momentum in BTC based on breakouts above key resistance levels, positive trend observations on higher timeframes, and some traders highlighting scalping and buying opportunities. There are, however, mixed views with some calling out short opportunities at resistance, but the overall sentiment leans toward further upside if daily or 4hr closes hold above 106.5k-108k. Several opinions reference breakouts, higher highs, and the possibility of reaching new all-time highs if key resistance is cleared.
